verbose_text: The rare and life threatening disease thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) is caused by a severe deficiency in the metalloprotease ADAMTS13 (a d isintegrin a nd m etalloprotease with t hrombo s pondin type 1 motif, member 13).
evidence: TTP) is caused by a severe deficiency in the metalloprotease ADAMTS13
